title: Connection will not keep
body: I would like to know if there is anything I can do to prevent this from happening. I have a solid 70 fps and 43 ms for the first few minutes of the last two games I have played and yet after the first few minutes I cannot do anything. It appears that I have control, but the minions don't move and nothing works. Then after 30 seconds of this the attempting to reconnect screen appears and it reconnects, allows me to play for a second and the process starts over. Is there anything I could do?

replies.body: It does sound like your network is having problems holding a stable connection, so it can't communicate what's happening in-game.  I'm guessing you're suffering from packet loss, but I suggest using a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to know for sure.  The results should also offer some troubleshooting steps as well.  Let me know what you find.

Thanks for the quick reply. The log reader showed that I was suffering from packet loss. I had already followed as many of the steps as possible that were recommended with little improvement, still unplayable. Do you think this may be something that will pass with time?

Thanks for the update!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help out individually.  Be sure to include the info found in the log reader, and grab some additional logs as well through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
